name: Drivers of recovery (number of European bird species)
description: The number of European bird species that have seen a significant recovery in their populations in recent decades, categorized by the main driver of their recovery.
datasetName: Drivers of recovery in European bird species (ZSL, 2022)

display.name: Number of recovered European bird species by driver

source.name: Ledger, S.E.H., Rutherford, C.A., Benham, C., Burfield, I.J., Deinet, S., Eaton, M., Freeman, R., Gray, C., Herrando, S., Scott-Gatty, K., Staneva, A. and McRae, L., (2022) Wildlife Comeback in Europe: Opportunities and challenges for species recovery.
source.dataPublishedBy: Ledger, S.E.H, Rutherford, C.A, Benham, C., Burfield, I.J., Deinet, S., Eaton, M., Freeman, R., Gray, C., Herrando, S., Scott-Gatty, K., Staneva, A and McRae, L., (2022) Wildlife Comeback in Europe: Opportunities and challenges for species recovery.
source.additionalInfo: This dataset is taken from Figure 13 on page 249 of the Wildlife Comeback in Europe report (2022).
